original_text: His body was like topaz, his face like lightning, his eyes like flaming torches, his arms and legs like the gleam of burnished bronze, and his voice like the sound of a multitude.
korean_text: 또 그의 몸은 황옥 같고 그의 얼굴은 번갯빛 같고 그의 눈은 횃불 같고 그의 팔과 발은 빛난 놋과 같고 그의 말소리는 무리의 소리와 같더라

sentences.original_text: his arms and legs like the gleam of burnished bronze
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 팔과 다리는 닦아낸 놋쇠의 광채 같았으며

sentences.original_text: and his voice like the sound of a multitude
